statements: UPDATE TravelData SET travel_duration = '03:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TravelData SET passenger_count = 3, travel_distance = 500.75 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE TravelData SET travel_distance = 150.5, passenger_count = 3, travel_duration = '04:30:00' WHERE id = 1 AND origin_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
UPDATE TravelData SET passenger_count = 2, travel_duration = '02:45:00', travel_distance = 100.75 WHERE destination_location = 'Chicago' AND origin_location = 'Miami' AND id = 2;
UPDATE travel_data SET revenue = 1500.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE travel_trends SET trend_description = 'Exploring new destinations' WHERE trend_id = 3;
UPDATE travel_data SET location='Paris', revenue=1500 WHERE id=101;
UPDATE travel_trends SET trend_description='Exciting new trend', trend_score=9.5 WHERE trend_id=201;
UPDATE historical_travel_data SET distance = 150.5, travel_duration = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE travel_predictions SET predicted_demand = 200, optimization_strategy = 'Route Optimization' WHERE source_location = 'City A' AND destination_location = 'City B';
UPDATE historical_travel_data SET distance = 200, travel_duration = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE travel_predictions SET predicted_demand = 500, optimization_strategy = 'Cost-efficient' WHERE destination_location = 'City A';
UPDATE historical_trips SET trip_distance = 150.75 WHERE trip_id = 12345;
UPDATE travel_trends SET trend_description = 'New trend description', trend_name = 'Updated Trend Name' WHERE trend_id = 98765;
UPDATE historical_trips SET trip_distance = 500.75 WHERE trip_id = 1001
UPDATE travel_trends SET trend_description = 'Exploring new trends in travel industry' WHERE trend_id = 15
UPDATE TravelData SET traveler_name = 'John Doe', destination_city = 'Paris' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FutureDemand SET demand_prediction = 500 WHERE demand_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE TravelData SET origin_city='San Francisco', destination_city='New York' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE BusinessStrategies SET strategy_description='Updated strategy description', strategy_name='New Strategy' WHERE id=3;
